duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a small team through the project process, fostering a supportive environment and mentoring junior staff.
Lead the team in the creation and revision of client presentations and mood boards.
Assist the team in finding contract-grade materials, fixtures, and furniture.
Manage coordination with product vendors to obtain pricing and lead time information.
Review shop drawings, answer RFIs, and attend site visits as required.
Provide Design Director updates on project progress and completion.
Manage Client relationship alongside Design Director to ensure quality service is maintained throughout the project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or related field (Master's preferred)
